pages.text: Lots of treasure is obtainable in the vault. Different types of loot is collectable inside $(l)chests, coin piles, and treasure rooms$(). $(br2)However, $(l)Vault Gems$() are also obtainable in structures and walls.

$(br)Another big collectable is the $(l)Rewards Chest$() you receive after finishing the vault, like the boss crate. The contents of these chests is time sensitive, which means the faster you complete the vault's objective, the better the loot.
